1.name: Batman
1.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

2.name: Road House
2.description: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

3.name: The 'Burbs
3.description: An overstressed suburbanite and his fellow neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block are part of a murderous Satanic cult.

4.name: Dead Poets Society
4.description: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

5.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
5.description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

6.name: Parenthood
6.description: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

7.name: Pet Sematary
7.description: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

8.name: Back to the Future Part II
8.description: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

9.name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
9.description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

10.name: The Little Mermaid
10.description: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

11.name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
11.description: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

12.name: When Harry Met Sally...
12.description: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

13.name: Do the Right Thing
13.description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

14.name: Ghostbusters II
14.description: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

15.name: Licence to Kill
15.description: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. Agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

16.name: Steel Magnolias
16.description: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.

17.name: The Abyss
17.description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

18.name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
18.description: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

19.name: Society
19.description: An ordinary teenage boy discovers his family is part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

20.name: Field of Dreams
20.description: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

21.name: Leviathan
21.description: An American deep-sea mining colony stumbles upon a sunken Soviet vessel hiding a horrific secret.

22.name: Say Anything...
22.description: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

23.name: Little Monsters
23.description: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

24.name: The Karate Kid Part III
24.description: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

25.name: Tango & Cash
25.description: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

26.name: Cyborg
26.description: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

27.name: Major League
27.description: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

28.name: Weekend at Bernie's
28.description: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

29.name: Uncle Buck
29.description: Bachelor and all-round slob Buck babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

30.name: Glory
30.description: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

31.name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
31.description: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

32.name: Lean on Me
32.description: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school and he is determined to improve by any and all means.

33.name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
33.description: The wife of an abusive criminal finds solace in the arms of a kind regular guest in her husband's restaurant.

34.name: Lethal Weapon 2
34.description: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

35.name: The Wizard
35.description: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

36.name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
36.description: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

37.name: Wild Orchid
37.description: A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.

38.name: Majo no takkyûbin
38.description: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

39.name: Cutting Class
39.description: A murderer is loose in a high school in this 'whodunit' movie.

40.name: My Left Foot: The Story of Christy Brown
40.description: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

41.name: Born on the Fourth of July
41.description: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

42.name: The Return of Swamp Thing
42.description: The Swamp Thing returns to battle the evil Dr. Arcane, who has a new science lab full of creatures transformed by genetic mutation, and chooses Heather Locklear as his new object of ...                See full summary »

43.name: Black Rain
43.description: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

44.name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
44.description: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

45.name: Teen Witch
45.description: High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?

46.name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
46.description: A boatful of graduating high school students headed to Manhattan accidentally pull Jason Voorhees along for the ride.

47.name: Kickboxer
47.description: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

48.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street: The Dream Child
48.description: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

49.name: Harlem Nights
49.description: During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.

50.name: Look Who's Talking
50.description: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice-over.
